Summary: 2 crafts flying in erratic patterns--up/down--circles at night.
trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Modesto
There were no other sightings in Modesto on or around April 10th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailsi stepped outside to let my dogs out and noticed to crafts in the night sky to the northwest. i thought they may be planes at first and that they were too close together. one of the objects had a red and a blue light and would fly in a pattern of circles and would go up and down in altitude very quickly, the other had a 2 rows of red lights on top of each other in a very distinct rectangular shape, it also did the maneuvers like the other but would disappear at times. they seemed almost like they were playing with each other. there was no sound, but they seemed to be very far away. i got my digital camera and took pictures of the lights as they slowly got farther away and then i got in my car to see if i could get closer to them as they left but they were gone by the time i put my dogs up and got in my car. i have a new laptop and cant figure out how to put in the compact flash card to upload the pictures.
